Key Match Events: India lost 1-2 to Afghanistan in their previous meeting, and they will be looking to bounce back in this match.
Pre-Game Insights: India have been winless in five straight matches, while Afghanistan are seeking a first victory in four games.
India's record goalscorer Sunil Chhetri is expected to lead the line and rack up his 150th international cap.
Afghanistan will be without several key players due to alleged corruption.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India will be aiming to get back to winning ways on home turf, having not won a game in front of their fans since June 2023.
Afghanistan currently sit bottom of Group A with just one point picked up from three outings.
Others: India are expected to put on an improved showing and carry the day at the end of the 90 minutes, according to the writer's prediction.
